tool_description: Analyse the positive, negative  and comparative scores of the given sentences with an ease.
name: Sentiment Analysis
title: Sentiment Analysis

api_list.name: sentence
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sentiment-analysis5.p.rapidapi.com/wow! what a beautiful day"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sentiment-analysis5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sentiment-analysis5.p.rapidapi.com/{sentence}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sentiment-analysis5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
